edits.content:
class UserProfileInline(admin.StackedInline):
    model = UserProfile
    can_delete = False
    verbose_name_plural = "Profile Details"
    fields = ("firm_description", "key_differentiators", "key_objectives", "investor_profile", "first_name", "last_name", "created_at", "updated_at")
    readonly_fields = ("created_at", "updated_at")
    extra = 0
    classes = ("collapse",)
